AbstractText: Books reviewed in this article: The Biochemistry of Plants (Volume 15), Molecular Biology. Ed. by A. Marcus. Plant Canopies: Their Growth, Form and Function. Ed. by G. Russell, B. Marshall and P. G. Jarvis. Photosynthetic Pigments of Algae. By Kingsley S. Rowan. Basic Growth Analysis. By R. Hunt. Respiration and Crop Productivity. By J. S. Amthor. Biotechnology in Agriculture and Foresty (Vol. 7), Medicinal and Aromatic Plants II. Ed. by Y. P. S. Bajaj. Plant Fibers. Ed. by H. F. Linskens and J. F. Jackson. IAWA* List of Microscopic Features for Hardwood Identification. By an IAWA Committee, ed. by E. A. Wheeleer, P. Bass and P. E. Gasson. Morphology of Flowers and Inflorescences. By F. Weberling and translated by R. J. Pankhurst. East African Weeds and their Control. By G. W. Ivens. Developemental Biology of Fern Gametophytes. By V. Raghavan. A Dictonary of Plant Pathology. By Paul Holliday. Microfungi on Miscellaneous Substrates: An Identification Handbook. By Martin B. Ellis and J. Pamila Ellis.
